text:
- [Voiceover] Data-driven
organizations are innovating

across all industries but
because data is vast, dynamic,
and comes in different formats,

extracting value from
it can be challenging.
Harnessing data's full potential
requires an end-to-end modern strategy

to store and access data,
analyze and visualize it,
and get insights and predictions from it.
For example, online businesses
rely on and generate a lot of data.

As their business grows, they
need purpose-built databases

that can scale and deliver
the best price performance.

They also need to
process click stream data
coming from websites and mobile devices
and censor data from IoT services,
which can unlock new opportunities.

To discover insights like
customer churn rates,

they can unify different
types of data in a data lake
and then use analytics and BI tools

to analyze data and build
dashboards to derive insights.

They can use data to fuel
machine learning too,
creating better customer experiences
and improving operational efficiencies.

AWS provides the most
comprehensive set of services
for the entire data journey

across databases, analytics,
and machine learning.
Join the millions

who are making the most
of their data with AWS.
(soft music)
